nodes.text: Corporal Ballala was a Human male corporal of the Galactic Republic stationed on Balmorra during the Galactic War against the resurgent Sith Empire. He sold weapons in Bugtown.

Ballala appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Weapons Vendor for Republic players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Weapons Vendors.
